page.title: 02WELSH LANGUAGE IN THE VALE
page.content: There are several{Welsh}speaking households in this area. The Ysgol Feithrin (Welsh nursery school) in Wenvoe closed several years ago because of falling attendance. The nearest are in Barry and Cowbridge. One child attends Ysgol Gymraeg in Barry (primary level), but none at present attend secondary education. This area lies within the catchments of Glan Taff, Whitchurch and Coed yr Gorf Cowbridge. There is a chapel (Wallston) in Wenvoe where Welsh services are held once a month. The Welsh society in Barry is supported by inhabitants from the area who also attend events given by the Dinas Powys Welsh society as well as Welsh language events in Cardiff. A small number of Welsh speakers are also actively involved in the promotion of their language.
